synopsis.text:
Otoboku 2, also known as "Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru: Futari no Elder The Animation," introduces us to Chihaya Mikado, a high school student with a strikingly feminine appearance. After enduring relentless harassment and bullying at his previous school, Chihaya's mother decides to transfer him to her alma mater, Seio Girls' School. To blend in, Chihaya adopts the name Chihaya Kisakinomiya and begins attending the school disguised as a girl.

Despite his hopes for a peaceful school life, Chihaya's attractive appearance and impressive academic performance quickly make him the center of attention. Fortunately, he is befriended by Kaoruko Nanahara, a kind-hearted classmate who once saved him from a playboy. Together, they navigate the challenges of dormitory life.

However, Chihaya's secret isn't easy to keep, especially from Kaoruko. Will he be able to maintain his disguise and find the peace he yearns for at Seio Girls' School? Only time will tell in this captivating tale of friendship, trust, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
